ValidationRule.description: Validation required to ensure Confirmed Rate are not left blank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'StarTrack', $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Reduction'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Accepted'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Deferral'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Go early') ), OR( ISNULL(Confirmed_Rate__c) ) )
